title: braum jungle
body: if braum could ward jump, he'd be lee sin tier jungler braum has great early damage, a decent clear, great defence steroids for the jungle. if he could ward jungle he could pull of sick ganks too. ward jump to AA range, then q to slow/proc stun. he's great for the new jungle coz with the rock bro's buff he can double stun the jungle camps.

replies.body:
My friend plays jungle Braum all the time, and he isn't all that bad at it...
Did you happen to be in a game with him?
decided to give it a shot i the new jungle since it is free week. finding the right gank approach (no gapcloser) can be difficult though.
I would love to see him played in something other than Support. I always found him fun to play. But I think his support game which is already good would get a huge jump because of this.
